title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: This RFC outlines the detailed requirements for the VoiceActivatedAdBlocker project. The document will encompass desired features (such as ad filtering, cross-device synchronization, and voice command functionality), supported platforms, integration with existing ad-blocking technologies, user experience considerations, data privacy and security requirements, scalability and performance goals, voice command recognition and processing, AI-powered ad detection and filtering mechanisms, testing strategies, deployment plans, maintenance procedures, update strategies, and any other relevant technical and non-technical aspects. The document will also outline strategies for integrating with existing AI technologies and ensuring compliance with advertising industry standards.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the voice recognition component, ad-blocking logic, and integration with various platforms and devices.

title: Develop Voice Recognition Module
description: Implement the voice recognition module that can accurately interpret user commands for ad-blocking.

title: Implement Ad-Blocking Logic
description: Develop the core ad-blocking logic that can selectively filter out unwanted ads based on user preferences and voice commands.

title: Integrate with Platforms and Devices
description: Develop the necessary integrations to enable the ad-blocking system to work seamlessly across various platforms and devices.

title: Implement User Interface and Voice Command System
description: Design and develop the user interface and voice command system for the ad-blocking application.

title: Set up Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Establish a comprehensive testing and quality assurance process to ensure the ad-blocking system functions correctly and meets the defined requirements.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Develop and implement security measures to protect user privacy and prevent potential vulnerabilities or misuse of the ad-blocking system.

title: Deploy and Maintain the System
description: Set up the necessary infrastructure and processes for deploying and maintaining the ad-blocking system across various platforms and devices.

title: Create User Documentation and Support Resources
description: Develop comprehensive user documentation, tutorials, and support resources to assist users in effectively utilizing the ad-blocking system.
dependencies: Implement User Interface and Voice Command System
